messages.do_not_add_player_fields: Please, do not add any fields requesting player personal info! Player profile is included automatically in every application.

field_values.helpText:
input only if you have set «select box» or «multi select box» type.

Format:
[id][value]
[id][value]

For example:
[1][from friends]
[2][from friendly website]

field_default.helpText:
what should be shown in field by default?

In case of «checkbox» type: if you want the checkbox to be checked, input «1».

In case of «multi select box» type: if you want some of multi select box` checkboxes to be checked, input ids of those checkboxes with minus sign on the sides, e.g., «-1-2-5-»

In case of «select box» type: input id of default selection here, e.g., «2»

show_if.helpText: the field will appear in application only if a specified value of another «select box» or «multi select box» has been already set.

values: player can view, but cannot edit
player can view and edit + the field can be seen in an application in roles list

field_help.helpText: a helpful text describing the field for players.

field_code.helpText: fields order in application. Field with priority 0 will be shown on top of an application form.

show_in_filters.helpText: if checkbox is set, gamemasters are able to search applications by this field in «Applications list».

hide_field_on_application_create.helpText: if checkbox is set, player will not see this field during application creation. Such field cannot be mandatory.
